name: The Charcoal Funnel
description:
The Charcoal Funnel coat takes its inspiration from the Chinese Military. With its shoulder and wrist tabs this coat takes its inspiration seriously, much like the soldiers who wear them. The high collar will help keep your neck warm throughout the winter, and when it warms up, the lapel folds over and fastens to give you a bit of breathing room. 

The Charcoal DB Funnel is made from a 60% new wool blend, offering superb insulation and total durability.  The Charcoal Funnel  is both comfortable and fantastic for every day use. 

This coat tapers in slightly around the waist, giving a slimmer look to the wearer.  Either over a button-up or V-neck, this coat will most certainly complete your look. 


Sizing Chart:

Length (Neck to bottom) 
S:78cm M:80cm  L: 82cm 
                     
Chest Width (Underarm to underarm)  
S:51.5cm  M:55.5cm L:59.5cm 

Sleeve Length (Crown to Cuff)    
S:65.5cm   M:66.5cm L:67.5cm    

Shoulder Width (Across Shoulders) 
S:44.4cm   M:47cm     L:49.6cm     

Waist (Across front of waist)  
S:48cm      M:52cm   L:56cm

name: The Reefer
description:
The Reefer represents the more formal end of the RFT line.  Its classic double breasted feature lends well to both work and play.  The wide revere collar adds body and style whilst paying homage to the old time American gangster spirit.  The slip pockets combine convenience and comfort and the sleeve tab give the air of sophistication.

The Charcoal DB Reefer is made from a 60% recycled wool blend, offering superb insulation and total durability.  The  Reefer is both comfortable and fantastic for every day use. 

The fit tapers slightly at the waist giving it a slimmer look while retaining its classic features.  Whether worn over a suit, a collared shirt or a V-neck, The Reefer completes any look.

name: The General
description:
The General takes its inspiration from the Chinese Military. With its high collar and uniform-like buttons, the General most certainly means business.  The collar can be unbuttoned to keep things casual, or keep it buttoned up to brave the winter wind.   The jet pockets keep the coat sleek allowing for the convenience of pockets while not detracting from its overall sturdiness.

The General has a lighter weight Meldon fabric.  Its properties are 60% recycled wool blend, so you can be sure that you will be fully insulated to weather the Pacific north  west's winter rain. 

This coat tapers slightly at the waist detailing a sturdy look.   It is meant to look as solid as the men who wear it.  Whether worn over a sweater or a collared shirt you will always look like the man in charge.



Sizing Chart:

S:50cm      M:52.5cm   L:55cm

name: The Ascot
description:
The Ascot was inspired by the storied British past time of fox hunting. This lightweight coat takes that inspiration to heart with features like the gun patch on the right shoulder. The coat also features a collar that can be fastened to stop the cold wind from penetrating, or opened to make this classic look more casual. 

Made of 100% natural cotton, this coat is not for the dead of winter, but rather to keep you looking classy during the changing of seasons.  Perfect for those autumn months or even as winter is loosening its grip, The Ascot combines the optimal amount of protection with optimal style. 

The Ascot is a slimmer fitter garment as it tapers slightly around the waist to give you that snug V-Shape that we all look for.  If you want to distinguish yourself this fall, grab yourself one of these, throw on some dark jeans and dress shoes and you will be looking fresh to hunt in the urban jungle.


Sizing Chart:

name: The Versatile Revere
description:
The Versatile Revere is aptly named because we believe that it should be in every mans wardrobe. Revere is the collar style which resembles one from a suit, which implies formality. This coat, however, can be worn with anything from suits to shirts to a simple V-neck; hence, the Versatile Revere. It is on the classier end of our line, and it can be dressed up or down to complement any look.  

The Versatile Revere is made of a 60% ]that will keep you warm and insulated from the weather. The higher level of polyester means that this coat will keep you safe from the cold and wet conditions of the Pacific north west winter.   The Charcoal exterior is set off by the striking blue lining which ensure that this coat is one of a kind. 

The fit of this wonderful coat is relatively slim, and it is cut to give you that tapered look. The Versatile Revere  adapts to the changing conditions almost as well as you do.

name: The Air-Force Mayfair
description:
The Air-force Mayfair takes its inspiration from the old school British pilots. Being double breasted and with strong lines, this is a bold coat for strong men.  Its 6 buttons, wide collar and slit pockets define the sophistication and strength of this coat.  More on the formal side, it can be perfectly paired with a suit, however, it can look just as great on a pair of jeans and a shirt. 

Consisting of 70% new wool blend, this coat is thick and is effective at keeping the cold at bay. The fabric is very durable and will definitely stand up to rain. The quilted lining is a quintessentially British and trimmed in a dark green akin to the classic British Racing Green. 

This coat narrows slightly at the waist to fit snugly, while its double breasted feature makes you look tough and sturdy, like you are ready to climb into your spitfire and enter a dogfight.

name: The Oxford Military
description:
The Oxford Military is an exceptionally unique coat. It takes it's inspiration from British Military jackets and takes them to the next level with the quilted gilet. The quilting on the inside adds to the style and can be zipped up all the way to keep the weather at bay.  Whether worn with a sweater or a V-neck, the Oxford is bold and unique.

The fabric is also unique, but you have to look closely to notice the intricate detail in the weave. We used a Tweed-like fabric, made of a 38% recycled wool blend.   The lining is quilted and pays homage to the British roots with its dark British Racing Green lining. We believe that this unique fabric will keep you warm and looking sharp throughout this winter. 

The fit of this coat is rather straight, it does taper slightly in on the waist but it meant to give you a bit of space to pack on the underclothes.

name: The French Navy Duffle
description:
The French Navy Duffle is one of the two Duffle Coats we are offering this season.  The wooden toggle is definitely in style right now, and is a unique addition to this coat. The brass buttons and clasps add a classic naval touch and the hood will make sure your fresh haircut doesn't get damaged on the way to class or the office.  Whether with jeans or khakis, with this coat you are certain to distinguish yourself from the crowd.

The color of this coat is called French Navy. You will not see many coats in this color. It works especially well with the wood and brass giving a maritime theme. The fabric is made of 60% recycled wool blend, ensuring total comfort and warmth.  It is specially insulated with a featured brass colored polyester lining that will effectively retain your body heat. 

The French Navy duffle sits a little differently, it is not necessarily slim, rather it sits quite square. It is also shorter than the other Duffle, so pay close attention to the length in the sizing chart to make sure it meets with your satisfaction.

name: The Navy Brook
description:
The Navy Brook takes its inspiration from the British hunting jacket.  The Navy Brook's main highlight is its Gun Patch on the left shoulder. This is just the start of the details of this coat. With it's double breast buttons, the Navy Brook is smart and strong, and exudes confidence and class. The large pockets are a useful feature with smaller jet pockets above them for extra convenience. It also features tabs on the shoulders to give that military formality, as this coat is meant for the strong and confident men. 

The Brook in navy is made of 60% recycled wool blend. That means this coat will keep you insulated and protected while you brave the urban jungle. Combined with the navy lining, this coat is smart, strong and will get you noticed. 

The fit of this coat is rather straight, but it does taper slightly at the waist.   It leaves you room to wear layers underneath, and it provides you with size and strength.

name: The Dark Earth Ferguson
description:
The Dark Earth Ferguson is a quilted wool coat, reminiscent of a British squire.   One of the main features, the faux suede patch, adds substance and texture, furthering the uniqueness of this coat. The collar tab allows you to tighten up when the weather worsens, or loosen up to adapt your style.  On the more casual end of the RFT line, the Ferguson is at home with jeans, t-shirts, collared shirt and sweaters.  The quilted exterior brings European style  and added comfort to your 'up-to-date' look.

Consisting of 55%  recycled wool blend, the dark earth Ferguson is truly unique, insulated and durable.  Combined with the black lining, this coat allows you to separate yourself from the crowd.

It fits slim, tapering in at the waist, giving you a snug feel, while maintaining your unique look.

name: The Chairman
description:
The Chairman is a full length coat that we believe should be in everyman's wardrobe.  It can be worn with anything from a suit to a collared shirt to a simple v neck.  It features a coin pocket,  that allows for convenience and style as well as a lapel pocket if you choose to dress it up and add a pocket square.  It is a classic three button revere, and it can be dressed up or down to complement any look.  

The Chairman is made out of 50% recycled wool blend.  It has a very unique fabric called charcoal herringbone  that really distinguishes this coat from the rest of the line.  It has a shimada lining in a light grey that completes this look.  This coat is reliable at keeping the weather at bay so you will be comfortable wearing it over your best suit.

The fit of this wonderful coat is relatively slim, and it is cut to give you that tapered look.  


Sizing Chart:

name: The Duffle
description:
The Duffle is one of two duffles we are offering this season.   The main feature about this coat is that it has four black wooden toggles that really distinguish this coat.  It has a large hood with its own unique clasp details, along with matching sleeve clasps.  What makes this coat truly unique is the same feature that makes it exceedingly useful; it is actually two coats in one.  The lining of the duffle is actually a wool blend which is both thick and warm - winter will not penetrate this coat.

It is 60% new wool blend on both the inside and outside, making this coat the warmest wool coat we have to offer.  The lining has a unique plaid style, that sets it apart from any other coat.

It is a longer coat that does not taper, and rather it gives you a complete surrounding feeling.  This coat combines style and warmth unlike anything on the market. If you truly want to decimate the winter, put on this coat and enjoy being untouched by winters frozen grip. 


Sizing Chart:

Chest Width (Underarm to underarm)  
S:58cm  M:60.5cm L:63cm

name: The Navy Peacoat
description:
The Navy Peacoat is a classic sea faring peacoat.  It combines thickness and warmth while maintaining stylish features.  The broad collar exudes strength, solidity,  and confidence.  On the formal side of RFT's line, the Navy Peacoat allows you to look 'all business' yet by opening a few buttons, you can reveal your playful side.  

Consisting of 60% recycled wool blend, this coat is extremely comfortable, fully insulated, and maintains a classic look.  It will help keep you warm in the pacific northwest wind while standing up to light showers, keeping you protected from the onslaught of winter.


It tapers in around the waist for a slim look, and with its shorter cut, it completes your look.  Worn with anything from a suit to khakis, the Navy Peacoat will have you seaworthy in no time.
